classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.

slotProps.description: The props used for each slot inside.

slots.description: The components used for each slot inside.

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.

focusVisible.conditions: the action area is keyboard focused

slotDescriptions.focusHighlight: The component that renders the focusHighlight.
slotDescriptions.root: The component that renders the root.
